value.text:

A group named family IndexMusic and poem

Roads

When a family (History Tracers, 2024) grows, according to old people perspective, we are adding (summing) people to the family. We can also say that family is walking to the future when it is growing, but what would be the road? When we talk about roads, we think about:

  • A sacbé (plural sacbeoob), white road, that made connection between Maya cities (Diaz C, H., 2000, p. 22, 27, 28).
  • A Qhapac Ñan, the beautiful road, that was a road Inca with 24233.476 Miles (39000 Km) of extension connecting the whole Inca Empire (Jurado, Rosario C. V., 2008, pp. 1270 - 1271 ; Unesco - World Heritage Convention, 2009).
  • The Peabiru, a road connecting the Atlantic Ocean to the Pacific Ocean, according to chronicles (Borges, A. E., 2006).

Roads that we cross step by step, like a family growing per generations. To understand better, let us do an analogy with the numbers we have studied (History Tracers, 2024). The numbers used to count, are grouped as natural numbers, or positive numbers, and they are represented as ℕ = {0, 1, 2, 3, 4, ...}. We are going to work with Ribenboim's understand, so we are also going to use zero as a natural number (Weisstein, Eric W, Natural Number). When we are stopped, we did not walk, so we had 0 (zero) steps. Likewise, when there is not a specific family, we have 0 (zero) people as part of it. When there is a union between people, according to ancient people, a new family is made. This union action, or the summing action, is represented by math with the signal + (addition, or sum).
